characterDescription: Relador was the elderly Windrunner to whom Syl was bonded before the Recreance. He died in his only battle, releasing her from the bond.

characterDetails.History:
Syl bonded Relador soon after she was born, but told Kaladin that she wasn't ready for the bond.
When describing to Dalinar her pain after Relador's death, Syl says that her knight went to fight, despite his age. That he shouldn't have, and when he was killed, it hurt. She felt alone. So alone that she started to drift.
